Package Forms

Class FormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Forms.FormController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    registry.ErrorListener
    public class FormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements registry.ErrorListener
    This class handles actions launched from the main form (Menu selections, Toolbar buttons etc.)
